TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit BindableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class BindableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class BindableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定成員是否通常使用於繫結。

span.span: Specifies whether a member is typically used for binding.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以指定多個成員，通常是控制項的屬性，這個屬性。You can specify this attribute for multiple members, typically properties, on a control. 如果屬性已標記使用設定為`true`，則應引發屬性變更通知，該屬性。If a property has been marked with the set to `true`, then a property change notification should be raised for that property. 這表示，如果屬性是，則支援雙向資料繫結。This means that if the property is , then two-way data binding is supported. 如果是，您仍然可以於屬性繫結，但它應該不會顯示在一組預設的屬性要繫結，因為它可能會或可能不會引發屬性變更通知。If is , you can still bind to the property, but it should not be shown in the default set of properties to bind to, because it might or might not raise a property change notification. > [!NOTE] > 當您將標記的屬性設定為`true`，此屬性的值設定為常數成員。When you mark a property with set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 針對屬性標記為設定為`false`，這個值是。For a property marked with the set to `false`, the value is . 因此，若要檢查您的程式碼中的此屬性的值，您必須指定為屬性或。Therefore, to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as or . > [!CAUTION] > 您可以使用這個屬性只能在設計階段。You can use this attribute at design time only. 不會防止您繫結至任何屬性在執行階段。Nothing prevents you from binding to any property during run time. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[屬性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將屬性標示為可繫結至資料。The following code example marks a property as appropriate to bind data to. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 在下一步 的程式碼範例示範如何檢查的值針對`MyProperty`。The next code example shows how to check the value of the for `MyProperty`. 首先，此程式碼取得含有物件的所有屬性。First, the code gets a with all the properties for the object. 接下來，程式碼索引至以取得`MyProperty`。Next, the code indexes into the to get `MyProperty`. 最後，程式碼會傳回這個屬性的屬性，並將它們儲存於屬性變數。Finally, the code returns the attributes for this property and saves them in the attributes variable. 在程式碼範例顯示兩個不同的方式，來檢查的值。The code example presents two different ways to check the value of the . 在第二個程式碼片段中，此範例會呼叫方法。In the second code fragment, the example calls the method. 在最後的程式碼片段中，此範例會使用來檢查值的屬性。In the last code fragment, the example uses the property to check the value. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#2)] 如果您標示類別，使用下列程式碼範例，來檢查值。If you marked a class with the , use the following code example to check the value. [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您將標記的屬性設定為`true`，此屬性的值設定為常數成員。When you mark a property with the set to `true`, the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 針對屬性標記為設定為`false`，這個值是。For a property marked with the set to `false`, the value is . 因此，若要檢查您的程式碼中的此屬性的值，您必須指定為屬性或。Therefore, to check the value of this attribute in your code, you must specify the attribute as or . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將屬性標示為可繫結至資料。The following code example marks a property as appropriate to bind data to. 此程式碼範例會建立新，其值設定為，並將屬性繫結。This code example creates a new , sets its value to , and binds it to the property. remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會檢查以查看是否`MyProperty`為可繫結。The following code example checks to see whether `MyProperty` is bindable. 程式碼會先取得的屬性`MyProperty`執行下列動作：First the code gets the attributes for `MyProperty` by doing the following: - 擷取含有物件的所有屬性。Retrieving a with all the properties for the object. - 編制以取得`MyProperty`。Indexing into the to get `MyProperty`. - 屬性變數中儲存這個屬性的屬性。Saving the attributes for this property in the attributes variable. 然後，程式碼會設定`myAttribute`的值在並檢查屬性是否可繫結。Then, the code sets `myAttribute` to the value of the in the and checks whether the property is bindable. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須提供完整的組件名稱。For this code example to run, you must provide the fully qualified assembly name. 如需如何取得完整組件名稱的資訊，請參閱For information about how to obtain the fully qualified assembly name, see [組件名稱](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md)。[Assembly Names](~/docs/framework/app-domains/assembly-names.md). [!code-cpp[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic BindableAttribute.Bindable Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位是預設設定。The field is the default setting for the . 當您將標記的屬性值的建構函式`false,`的值，這個屬性設定為常數成員。When you mark a property with the constructor of the value `false,` the value of this attribute is set to the constant member . 因此，若要檢查屬性是否設定為這個程式碼中的值，您必須指定為屬性。Therefore, to check whether the attribute is set to this value in your code, you must specify the attribute as .
